channel.title: Butterflies Inside When I Am in Love With You on Yicong Zheng
channel.description: Recent content in Butterflies Inside When I Am in Love With You on Yicong Zheng

item.title: What is love?
item.description: It is simply another type of serial dependence (Manassi, 2019). It is when I stare at you and you stare at your stuffs. It is when I listen to my favorite song and look at your smile. It is when we finish our daily ritual and haste to hang up. It is reciprocal support and understanding.
